Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.28741926]Gram-positive bacteria :Staphylococcuss aureus ATCC 25923 (MIC=8 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli ATCC 25922 (MIC=0.5-1 μM), Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603 (MIC=4-8 μM), Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606 (MIC=1-2 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853 (MIC<0.25-0.5 μM);Fungi :Candida albicans ATCC 90028 (MIC=4 μM), Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 208821 (MIC=0.5 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.28741926] 20.6-32% hemolysis at 64 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.28741926] CC50 = 26.5 ± 2.4 μM against CRL-1739, CC50 = 2.0 ± 0.1 μM against MM96L, CC50 = 14.7 ± 1.5 μM against HFF-1, CC50 = 20.9 ± 1.4 μM against HeLa, CC50 = 15.2 ± 1.9 μM against MCF-7, CC50 = 1.3 ± 0.1 μM against K-562, CC50 = 15.7 ±1.1μM against HL-60;CC50=10.4 ± 1.0μM against PBMCs.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria, Antifungal activity agaist Candida albicans, Cryptococcus neoformans

Literature.Title: Redesigned Spider Peptide with Improved Antimicrobial and Anticancer Properties
Literature.Author: Sonia Troeira Henriques, Nicole Lawrence, Stephanie Chaousis, Anjaneya S. Ravipati, Olivier Cheneval,Aurelie H. Benfield, Alysha G. Elliott, Angela Maria Kavanagh, Matthew A. Cooper, Lai Yue Chan,Yen-Hua Huang, and David J. Craik
